reviewText: Amazing movie ! So much raw emotions!

I give this movie 2 thumbs up. The women ensemble in this movie were convincing in their individual portrayals of convicted felons all searching for forgiveness and a chance to start anew. The formation of the choir along with politics of convincing prison officials to give them a chance to at least try and the perserverance of all these women was indeed admirable. I  wanted a little more of the ending, but a sentenced served is just!
